titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I was occupied all the morning in writing a sermon for Sunday morning. After lunch I called on Gow, & talked awhile with him. Then I took a constitutional on the Embankment returning thro' the City. In the window of a bookstall in Whitehall I saw Rashdall's â€˜Doctrine & Development' marked 1/3 & I bought it at once. Side by side with it was my own "Apostolic Xty" offered for the same humbling figure.
